price: No mw’ihanwa rya Bene Thamuudi, harimwo Aayah n’inkebuzo, igihe Intumwa yabo Swalehe (nyakugira amahoro y’Imana Allah) yababwira iti: “Nimuryoherwe mu zanyu imisi itatu itarenga ntirenguke mu kurindira urwanyu ko rushika”.
arabic: وَفِي ثَمُودَ إِذۡ قِيلَ لَهُمۡ تَمَتَّعُواْ حَتَّىٰ حِينٖ

meta.transliteration: wafī thamūda idh qīla lahum tamattaʿū ḥattā ḥīnin
